Description.Text: Built in 2012, this resort aims to ensure its guests enjoy a relaxing and comfortable stay. The property features lovely rooms which are fully-equipped and designed in a Nubian tradition with domed ceilings and stone archways set around beautiful gardens. Guests are welcomed in the air-conditioned resort's lobby, which offers a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service, as well as a hotel safe, cloakroom and currency exchange facilities. There is a hairdressing salon, auditorium and TV lounge. Younger guests can let off steam in the kids' club and children's playground.
